content: Fix Vite environment variable access in api.ts and logger.ts - replace import.meta.env with proper Vite env access
Fix API response data access pattern in auth.ts - standardize response.data vs response.data.data access
Fix TaskForm.tsx recurring field error prop type mismatch (string vs boolean)
Fix TaskCard.test.tsx null assignments to string | undefined fields
Fix PointsDisplay.test.tsx multiple elements matching date text test
Fix Button component variant types - add 'outline' variant and update all usage
Fix Alert component type vs variant prop mismatch in pages
Fix family API response access in FamilyManagement.tsx
Remove all console.log debug statements and unused imports
Remove browser prompt() usage in Tasks.tsx and replace with proper UI components
